titleStmt.title: The pleasures of love and marriage a poem in praise of the fair sex, in requital for The folly of love, and some other late satyrs on women.
titleStmt.author: Ames, Richard, d. 1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for H.N. and are to be sold by R. Baldwin ...,
